name: Andiss Butcherson
effect: You pay (1) less to strike with weapons.
"My advice? Keep your scabbard greased and your blades sharp."

name: Annihilate
effect: Destroy target exhausted ally or exhausted equipment.
"You expend yourself too quickly." - Timmo Shadestep

name: Archival Purposes
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Take this vessel with you as you silence these echoes. A portion of their energies will be archived within the Bronze Dragonflight's depository." - Alurmi

name: Barman Shanker
effect: This weapon has +2 ATK while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.

name: Bizzazz
effect: When this ally enters play, draw a card.
"What this fight needs is a little Bizzazz!"

name: Boundless Agony
effect:
Damage can't be healed.

Damage is unpreventable.
The best that defenders can hope for is a quick death.

name: Bromor the Shadowblade
effect:
Stealth

When your hero strikes with a weapon, add a +1 ATK counter to that weapon.
"To be the perfect assassin, you must become like your blades, lad; ruthless, tireless, and bloodthirsty."

name: Bubula del Kissel
effect:
Stealth

→ Target hero or ally has Stealth this turn.
"Here's an idea: GET DOWN! They'll see you!"

name: Devious Dismantle
effect: Destroy target equipment. If you destroyed an equipment with cost 4 or less this way, its controller discards a card.
"Now, you were saying?"

name: Entrenched
effect:
If you control an ally: Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Diamant says you are to be trusted. Diamant is patient and wise, so I shall allow you to prove yourself." - Kor the Immovable

name: Escape from Durnholde
effect:
Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one on top of your deck and the rest on the bottom.
"We will leave when you are ready." - Thrall

name: Fan of Knives
effect:
Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to each opposing hero and ally.

On your turn: Discard a weapon → Put this ability from your graveyard into your hand.
"I always have another trick up my sleeve." - Ressa Shadeshine

name: Gouge
effect: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
"Study your intended victim and then exploit his weaknesses for maximum effectiveness." - Caleb Pavish

name: Infiltrate
effect: Up to two target heroes and/or allies have Assault 2 and Stealth this turn.
"Stick to the shadows. You'll live a lot longer that way." - Zimzi the Trickster

name: Kaelyn Vineminder
effect: When this ally enters play, target opposing ally can't ready during its controller's ready step while this ally remains under your control.
"You shall be imprisoned by the very earth that you seek to destroy!"

name: Prey on the Weak
effect: Destroy target ally with cost 4 or less.
Rogues don't much care about fair fights.

name: Scarlet Kris
effect: Its secret is that the blood of its victims keeps the scarlet color bright.

name: Sinister Strike
effect: Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to 1 plus the ATK of a Melee weapon you control.
It adds injury to insult.

name: Taerinar, Fang of Goldrinn
effect: (3), Flip Taerinar → Weapons you control have +2 ATK this turn.
"To honor the spirit of the wolf ancient and his ferocity without being overcome by both is a delicate balance."

name: The Essence of Enmity
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"The creatures you seek swarm over the Den of Flame to the northwest and the Stonemaul Ruins to the north." - Brogg

name: The Path to the Dragon Soul
effect:
Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
"Distract Mannoroth, and the link between the Dragon Soul and the Well will be broken." - Nozdormu

name: Throat Slasher
effect:
Dual Wield

This weapon has +1 ATK while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.

name: Tommi Spazzratchet
effect: Stealth
"Keep their attention focused on you."

name: Wastewalker Shoulderpads
effect: When your hero attacks, you may exhaust target hero or ally.
Only the most heroic strive to redeem the lost souls of Auchindoun.

name: Wuzlo Grindergear
effect: Weapons you control have Assault 2.
"See what you can do with a little gnomish ingenuity?"
